epics.title: Backend Weather API Proxy
epics.goal: Secure proxy that fetches weather data from OpenWeatherMap, hiding the API key from the client
epics.definitionOfDone: Backend endpoint returns weather data for valid zipcode, handles errors gracefully

epics.title: Frontend Weather Display
epics.goal: React app with zipcode input that displays current weather conditions
epics.definitionOfDone: User can enter zipcode, see loading state, view weather data or error message

epics.title: Visual Polish & Responsive Design
epics.goal: Clean, minimal UI that works on desktop and mobile browsers
epics.definitionOfDone: App looks polished on all screen sizes, has proper spacing and typography

requirements.title: Create project structure and package.json for backend
requirements.description: Initialize the backend project with Node.js/Express, set up package.json with required dependencies (express, cors, dotenv, axios/node-fetch)
acceptanceCriteria: package.json exists with name, version, scripts (start, dev)
Dependencies include express, cors, dotenv, and a fetch library

requirements.title: Create Express server entry point
requirements.description: Set up the main Express server file with basic middleware (cors, json parsing) and a health check endpoint

requirements.title: Set up environment configuration
requirements.description: Create .env.example file and configure dotenv for loading environment variables including OpenWeatherMap API key
acceptanceCriteria: dotenv loads config on server start
Server logs warning if API key not configured
notes: User must obtain their own API key from OpenWeatherMap

requirements.title: Create weather API route structure
requirements.description: Set up the /api/weather route module with GET endpoint that accepts zipcode as query parameter
acceptanceCriteria: Route validates zipcode parameter is present
Returns 400 with error message if zipcode missing
Route handler is in separate routes file

requirements.title: Implement zipcode validation middleware
requirements.description: Create validation that checks zipcode format (5 digits for US) before making API call
acceptanceCriteria: Empty/missing zipcode returns 400 with 'Zipcode is required' message
Invalid format returns 400 with 'Invalid zipcode format' message

requirements.title: Create OpenWeatherMap API service
requirements.description: Service module that calls OpenWeatherMap API with zipcode and returns raw response
acceptanceCriteria: Service accepts zipcode and country code (default 'us')
Constructs correct OpenWeatherMap API URL with zip parameter
Includes API key from environment config

requirements.title: Define weather response data shape
requirements.description: Create a transformer that maps OpenWeatherMap response to a clean frontend-friendly format
acceptanceCriteria: Response includes: temperature (number), condition (string), humidity (number), windSpeed (number), locationName (string)

requirements.title: Integrate weather service with route handler
requirements.description: Connect the weather route to call the service and return transformed data
acceptanceCriteria: Response is JSON with transformed data shape

requirements.title: Handle OpenWeatherMap API errors
requirements.description: Catch and handle errors from the weather API including invalid zipcode, network errors, and rate limits
acceptanceCriteria: Invalid zipcode (404 from OWM) returns 404 with 'Location not found' message
API key invalid returns 500 with 'Weather service configuration error'
Network timeout returns 503 with 'Weather service unavailable'
Rate limit exceeded returns 429 with 'Too many requests'

requirements.title: Add global error handling middleware
requirements.description: Create centralized error handler that catches unhandled errors and returns consistent error response format
acceptanceCriteria: All errors return JSON with { error: string, code: string }
Unhandled errors return 500 with generic message
Error details logged server-side but not exposed to client
Stack traces only logged in development mode

requirements.title: Add request logging middleware
requirements.description: Log incoming requests with method, path, and response time for debugging
acceptanceCriteria: Each request logs: timestamp, method, path, status code, duration
Errors include error message in log

requirements.title: Add backend integration test setup
requirements.description: Set up Jest or similar test framework with basic integration test for weather endpoint
acceptanceCriteria: At least one integration test for /api/weather endpoint
Tests can mock external API calls

requirements.title: Initialize React frontend project
requirements.description: Create React app with Vite, configure Tailwind CSS, set up basic folder structure
acceptanceCriteria: npm run dev starts development server
notes: Frontend will be in separate frontend/ directory

requirements.title: Set up base CSS and Tailwind configuration
requirements.description: Configure Tailwind with custom theme colors if needed, set up base styles and CSS reset
acceptanceCriteria: Base styles imported in main CSS file
Tailwind utilities working (test with a colored div)

requirements.title: Create main App layout component
requirements.description: Build the main App component with centered layout, max-width container, and placeholder content area

requirements.title: Create ZipcodeInput component
requirements.description: Build the zipcode input field component with submit button
acceptanceCriteria: Input and button on same row or stacked nicely
data-testid attributes on input and button
Form submits on Enter key press

requirements.title: Add zipcode input state management
requirements.description: Manage the zipcode input value state and form submission handler
acceptanceCriteria: Input value controlled by React state
Form submission calls handler with zipcode value
Input clears or retains value based on UX decision (retain)
Submit disabled while input is empty

requirements.title: Create weather data fetch hook
requirements.description: Custom React hook that fetches weather data from backend API
acceptanceCriteria: useWeather hook exports: fetchWeather function, data, loading, error states

requirements.title: Handle loading state in weather hook
requirements.description: Set loading state to true while fetch is in progress, false when complete
acceptanceCriteria: loading is true immediately when fetchWeather called
loading becomes false after success or error
Multiple rapid calls handled correctly (only latest matters)

requirements.title: Handle error state in weather hook
requirements.description: Capture and expose error messages from failed API calls
acceptanceCriteria: error state is null on success
error contains message string on failure
Previous error cleared when new fetch starts

requirements.title: Integrate ZipcodeInput with App and weather hook
requirements.description: Wire up the ZipcodeInput component to trigger weather fetch on submit
acceptanceCriteria: App passes onSubmit handler to ZipcodeInput

requirements.title: Create LoadingSpinner component
requirements.description: Simple loading spinner component for display while fetching weather

requirements.title: Create WeatherCard component
requirements.description: Component that displays weather data in a clean card layout

requirements.title: Create ErrorMessage component
requirements.description: Component that displays error messages inline below input

requirements.title: Integrate all display states in App
requirements.description: Connect loading, error, and success states to display appropriate components
acceptanceCriteria: Only one state displayed at a time
Previous weather hidden when new fetch starts

requirements.title: Add empty state before first search
requirements.description: Display helpful prompt when app first loads and no search has been made
acceptanceCriteria: Shows message like 'Enter a zipcode to see the weather'
Styled to fit with overall minimal design
Hidden once a search is made

requirements.title: Add client-side zipcode format validation
requirements.description: Validate zipcode format on client before sending to API
acceptanceCriteria: Shows validation message for invalid input

requirements.title: Configure API base URL environment variable
requirements.description: Set up environment variable for backend API URL, with different values for dev/prod
acceptanceCriteria: API calls use this base URL

requirements.title: Style ZipcodeInput component
requirements.description: Apply Tailwind classes for clean, minimal input styling
acceptanceCriteria: Input has border, rounded corners, padding

requirements.title: Style WeatherCard component
requirements.description: Apply Tailwind classes for clean card appearance
acceptanceCriteria: Card has subtle shadow or border

requirements.title: Style overall page layout
requirements.description: Apply final styling to App container and page background

requirements.title: Add responsive breakpoints
requirements.description: Ensure layout works well on mobile and desktop screen sizes
acceptanceCriteria: Input and button stack nicely on small screens
Appropriate text sizes at different breakpoints
Weather card readable on all sizes

requirements.title: Polish loading spinner animation
requirements.description: Ensure spinner animation is smooth and visually appealing
acceptanceCriteria: Spinner uses Tailwind animate-spin or custom CSS animation

requirements.title: Polish error message styling
requirements.description: Ensure error messages are clearly visible but not jarring
acceptanceCriteria: Error text is readable red color
Icon or indicator optional but nice

requirements.title: Add testID attributes to all interactive elements
requirements.description: Ensure all key elements have data-testid for automated testing

requirements.title: Add weather condition icon
requirements.description: Display a simple icon or emoji representing the weather condition
acceptanceCriteria: Icon changes based on condition (sunny, cloudy, rainy, etc.)
Uses emoji or simple SVG icons
Accessible with alt text if image

requirements.title: Add request timeout handling
requirements.description: Set timeout for OpenWeatherMap API calls to prevent hanging requests

requirements.title: Add CORS configuration for production
requirements.description: Configure CORS to only allow requests from the frontend origin in production
acceptanceCriteria: CORS origin configurable via environment variable
Production restricts to deployed frontend URL

requirements.title: Add page favicon and title
requirements.description: Set up proper page title and favicon for the weather app
acceptanceCriteria: Page title is 'Weather App' or similar

requirements.title: Add keyboard accessibility
requirements.description: Ensure app is fully navigable via keyboard
acceptanceCriteria: Focus visible on all interactive elements

requirements.title: Add simple in-memory caching for weather data
requirements.description: Cache weather responses briefly to reduce API calls for same zipcode
acceptanceCriteria: Weather data cached for 5 minutes per zipcode
Cache checked before making API call
Cache size limited to prevent memory issues
Cache can be disabled via config
notes: Simple Map-based cache, no Redis needed

requirements.title: Set up frontend test framework
requirements.description: Configure Vitest or Jest with React Testing Library for component tests
acceptanceCriteria: At least one example component test

requirements.title: Add unit tests for ZipcodeInput component
requirements.description: Write tests for input behavior and form submission
acceptanceCriteria: Test input value updates on type
Test submit button disabled when empty

requirements.title: Add unit tests for WeatherCard component
requirements.description: Write tests for weather data display
acceptanceCriteria: Test all data fields render correctly

requirements.title: Add unit tests for useWeather hook
requirements.description: Write tests for the custom weather hook behavior
acceptanceCriteria: Test error state on failed fetch

requirements.title: Add unit tests for weather transformer
requirements.description: Test the data transformation from OpenWeatherMap format to frontend format

requirements.title: Add unit tests for zipcode validation
requirements.description: Test the zipcode validation middleware

requirements.title: Add subtle animations and transitions
requirements.description: Add micro-interactions for polish (button hover, card appear, etc.)
acceptanceCriteria: Weather card fades in on appear
Animations are subtle and not distracting

requirements.title: Add rate limiting to API endpoint
requirements.description: Prevent abuse by limiting requests per IP address
acceptanceCriteria: Limit to 30 requests per minute per IP

requirements.title: Add security headers middleware
requirements.description: Add helmet or similar for security headers

requirements.title: Add aria labels for screen readers
requirements.description: Ensure all elements have appropriate ARIA attributes

requirements.title: Ensure sufficient color contrast
requirements.description: Verify all text meets WCAG AA contrast requirements
acceptanceCriteria: All text has 4.5:1 contrast ratio minimum
Button text readable on button background

requirements.title: Add API response compression
requirements.description: Enable gzip compression for API responses

requirements.title: Add offline/network error detection
requirements.description: Detect when user is offline and show appropriate message
acceptanceCriteria: Shows 'You are offline' message when offline

requirements.title: Add Open Graph meta tags
requirements.description: Add meta tags for social media sharing preview

requirements.title: Create README with setup instructions
requirements.description: Document how to set up and run the backend
acceptanceCriteria: How to get OpenWeatherMap API key

requirements.title: Create frontend README with setup instructions
requirements.description: Document how to set up and run the frontend

requirements.title: Add development mock mode
requirements.description: Allow running backend without real API key using mock data
